verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H7651><s%> [was] seven שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> years יֹאָ֣שׁ <S%H3101><s%> Joash בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> forty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> His mother's צִבְיָ֖ה <S%H6645><s%> also [was] Zibiah מִבְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> of Beersheba

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יוֹאָ֛שׁ <S%H3101><s%> And Joash הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> all the days יְהוֹיָדָ֥ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> the priest

וַיִּשָּׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> took ל֥וֹ יְהוֹיָדָ֖ע <S%H3077><s%> And Jehoiada נָשִׁ֣ים <S%H802><s%> wives שְׁתָּ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> for him two וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and he begat בָּנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵיכֵ֑ן <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> came עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> was minded יוֹאָ֔שׁ <S%H3101><s%> this [that] Joash לְחַדֵּ֖שׁ <S%H2318><s%> to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיִּקְבֹּץ֮ <S%H6908><s%> And he gathered together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְהַלְוִיִּם֒ <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶ֡ם צְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> to them Go out לְעָרֵ֪י <S%H5892><s%> unto the cities יְהוּדָ֟ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְקִבְצוּ֩ <S%H6908><s%> and gather מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> of all Israel כֶּ֜סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money לְחַזֵּ֣ק ׀ <S%H2388><s%> to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> of your God מִדֵּ֤י <S%H1767><s%> from שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year בְּשָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> to year וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> and you תְּמַהֲר֣וּ <S%H4116><s%> and see that ye hasten לַדָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> the matter וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not מִֽהֲר֖וּ <S%H4116><s%> hastened הַֽלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> Howbeit the Levites

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called הַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <S%H4428><s%> And the king לִֽיהוֹיָדָ֣ע <S%H3077><s%> for Jehoiada הָרֹאשׁ֒ <S%H7218><s%> the chief וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֗וֹ מַדּ֙וּעַ֙ <S%H4069><s%> Why לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not דָרַ֣שְׁתָּ <S%H1875><s%> unto him Why hast thou not required עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites לְהָבִ֞יא <S%H935><s%> to bring in מִֽיהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> out of Judah וּמִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> and out of Jerusalem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַשְׂאַת֙ <S%H4864><s%> the collection מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> [according to the commandment] of Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְהַקָּהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> and of the congregation לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> for the tabernacle הָעֵדֽוּת׃ <S%H5715><s%> testimony

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עֲתַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6271><s%> of Athaliah הַמִּרְשַׁ֔עַת <S%H4849><s%> that wicked בָּנֶ֥יהָ <S%H1121><s%> For the sons פָרְצ֖וּ <S%H6555><s%> woman had broken up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> and even כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner קָדְשֵׁ֣י <S%H6944><s%> and also all the dedicated things בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> did they bestow לַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <S%H1168><s%> upon Baalim

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> commandment הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And at the king's וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> they made אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> chest אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> a וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֛הוּ <S%H5414><s%> and set בְּשַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> at the gate בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD חֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> it without

וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> And they made ק֞וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a proclamation בִּֽיהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> through Judah וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem לְהָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> to bring in לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD מַשְׂאַ֞ת <S%H4864><s%> the collection מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> [that] Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> of God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> [laid] upon Israel בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness

וַיִּשְׂמְח֥וּ <S%H8055><s%> rejoiced כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> And all the princes וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people וַיָּבִ֛יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought in וַיַּשְׁלִ֥יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> and cast לָאָר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> into the chest עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until לְכַלֵּֽה׃ <S%H3615><s%> until they had made an end

וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּעֵת֩ <S%H6256><s%> Now it came to pass that at what time יָבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> was brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאָר֜וֹן <S%H727><s%> the chest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פְּקֻדַּ֣ת <S%H6486><s%> office הַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king's בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> by the hand הַלְוִיִּם֒ <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites וְכִרְאוֹתָ֞ם <S%H7200><s%> and when they saw כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> there was רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> that [there was] much הַכֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money וּבָ֨א <S%H935><s%> came סוֹפֵ֤ר <S%H5608><s%> scribe הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king's וּפְקִיד֙ <S%H6496><s%> officer כֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> priest's הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> and the high וִיעָ֙רוּ֙ <S%H6168><s%> and emptied אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> the chest וְיִשָּׂאֻ֖הוּ <S%H5375><s%> and took וִֽישִׁיבֻ֣הוּ <S%H7725><s%> again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקֹמ֑וֹ <S%H4725><s%> it to his place כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> Thus they did לְי֣וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> day בְּי֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> by day וַיַּֽאַסְפוּ־ <S%H622><s%> and gathered כֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> in abundance

וַיִּתְּנֵ֨הוּ <S%H5414><s%> gave הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וִֽיהוֹיָדָ֗ע <S%H3077><s%> and Jehoiada אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עוֹשֵׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> it to such as did מְלֶ֙אכֶת֙ <S%H4399><s%> the work עֲבוֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> of the service בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּֽהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become שֹׂכְרִים֙ <S%H7936><s%> and hired חֹצְבִ֣ים <S%H2672><s%> masons וְחָרָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2796><s%> and carpenters לְחַדֵּ֖שׁ <S%H2318><s%> to repair בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> and also לְחָרָשֵׁ֤י <S%H2796><s%> and also such as wrought בַרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> iron וּנְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and brass לְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> to mend אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> wrought עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> labored הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> and the work וַתַּ֧עַל <S%H5927><s%> was אֲרוּכָ֛ה <S%H724><s%> perfected לַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> work בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> by them וַֽיַּעֲמִ֜ידוּ <S%H5975><s%> and they set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֧ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> of God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according מַתְכֻּנְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4971><s%> in his state וַֽיְאַמְּצֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H553><s%> and strengthened

וּֽכְכַלּוֹתָ֡ם <S%H3615><s%> And when they had finished הֵבִ֣יאוּ <S%H935><s%> [it] they brought לִפְנֵי֩ <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וִֽיהוֹיָדָ֜ע <S%H3077><s%> and Jehoiada אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7605><s%> the rest הַכֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of the money וַיַּעֲשֵׂ֨הוּ <S%H6213><s%> whereof were made כֵלִ֤ים <S%H3627><s%> vessels לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> for the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> [even] vessels שָׁרֵ֔ת <S%H8335><s%> to minister וְהַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> and to offer וְכַפּ֔וֹת <S%H3709><s%> [withal] and spoons וּכְלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> and vessels זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וָכָ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver וַ֠יִּֽהְיוּ <S%H1961><s%> become מַעֲלִ֨ים <S%H5927><s%> And they offered עֹל֤וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD תָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> continually כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the days יְהוֹיָדָֽע׃ <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada פ

וַיִּזְקַ֧ן <S%H2204><s%> waxed old יְהוֹיָדָ֛ע <S%H3077><s%> But Jehoiada וַיִּשְׂבַּ֥ע <S%H7646><s%> and was full יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> of days וַיָּמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> when he died בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old מֵאָ֧ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years בְּמוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4194><s%> [was he] when he died

וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֥הוּ <S%H6912><s%> And they buried בְעִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> him in the city דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> of David עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> among הַמְּלָכִ֑ים <S%H4428><s%> among the kings כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> because he had done טוֹבָה֙ <S%H2896><s%> good בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וְעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> among הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> both toward God וּבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> and toward his house ס

וְאַֽחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> Now after מוֹת֙ <S%H4194><s%> the death יְה֣וֹיָדָ֔ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada בָּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> came שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> the princes יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> and made obeisance לַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king אָ֛ז <S%H227><s%> for שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about
